name: Brihadeeswarar Temple
description: Built in the 11th century, this temple is known for its massive tower and intricate carvings.

name: Kailashnath Temple
description: This temple is famous for its rock-cut architecture and is dedicated to Lord Shiva.

name: Konark Sun Temple
description: Built in the 13th century, this temple is dedicated to the Sun God and is known for its intricate carvings.

name: Meenakshi Temple
description: This temple is dedicated to Goddess Meenakshi and is known for its towering gopurams and intricate carvings.

name: Somnath Temple
description: This temple is one of the 12 Jyotirlingas and is dedicated to Lord Shiva.
